Reviews.Title: night vison is great
Reviews.Author: WildBillV
Reviews.Content: this camera is fixed not remote you need to manually adjust for viewing area ,image quality is great,works well in low to no lightoverall good camera easy installation have had in operation about a month and no problems.

ProductInfo.Features:
Super-high Resolution 1/3" Sony Effio Ccd Image Sensor
Ip67 Weatherproof Rating For Indoor/outdoor Use
Vandal Resistant Aluminum Construction
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SWPRO-761CAM Pro-761  Dome Camera (White)
